column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////This is an upper-mid scale tapas spot that retains a strong following a score of years after it opened. That's impressive. Seriously
column2: that people would continue to want to dine here two decades after it was the hot spot on the Halsted strip in LP bespeaks something. What that is
column3: I suppose is highly subjective but it will make a review nonetheless.
